name: neon-electron
description: A simple example of GUI application with Electron and Rust, by using neon.

scripts.compile: npm run compile-main && npm run compile-renderer
scripts.sync: mkdir -p $(npm prefix)/node_modules && for m in `ls --color=none $(npm prefix)/local_modules`; do rsync -C --filter=':- .gitignore' -rlpcgoD ./local_modules/$m/ $(npm prefix)/node_modules/$m/; done
